Name: Warrior
Description: A trained combatant in all manner of weapons and armor. What you lack in arcane knowledge you make up for in pure physical prowess.

ClassAbilities.Name: Power Strike
ClassAbilities.Effect: Attack 1 creature within 1 space. The attack can use any weapon you have equipped, but the damage dice is increased to 1d12, if the weapons damage is less than that.

ClassAbilities.Name: Shield Wall
ClassAbilities.Effect: Allies within 1 space of you add +1 to their defense rolls.

AbilityDeck.Name: Cleave
AbilityDeck.Description: Use a weapon to attack multiple enemies.

Abilities.Name: Cleave
Abilities.Effect: Attack 2 creature within 1 space of you and 1 space of each other. The attacks can use any weapon you have equipped.

AbilityDeck.Name: Shield Wall
AbilityDeck.Description: Defensive stance to protect nearby allies.

Abilities.Name: Shield Wall
Abilities.Effect: Allies within 1 space of you add +1 to their defense rolls.

AbilityDeck.Name: Battle Endurance
AbilityDeck.Description: Take a breather to regain some hearts.

Abilities.Name: Battle Endurance
Abilities.Effect: Roll your Con die and regain a number of hearts equal to the result.

AbilityDeck.Name: Soldiers March
AbilityDeck.Description: Your speed is that of a trained soldier.

Abilities.Name: Soldiers March
Abilities.Effect: Your movement rolls use your Str instead of your Dex.

AbilityDeck.Name: Riposte
AbilityDeck.Description: Get an attack against a target that damages you.

Abilities.Name: Riposte
Abilities.Effect: When you take damage from an attack within 1 space of you, you can make 1 attack against the attacker. The attack can use any weapon you have equipped.

AbilityDeck.Name: Battlefield Commander
AbilityDeck.Description: Snap your allies to attention, increasing their attack dice size.

Abilities.Name: Battlefield Commander
Abilities.Effect: Until the start of your next turn, the damage dice of attacks made by your allies increases by 1.

AbilityDeck.Name: Admiration of Skill
AbilityDeck.Description: You are bolstered when an ally shows strength of arms.

Abilities.Name: Admiration of Skill
Abilities.Effect: Whenever an ally rolls the max number on the dice of an attack roll using a weapon you regain 1 missing heart.

AbilityDeck.Name: Move Those Feet
AbilityDeck.Description: Have a creature re-roll their initiative.

Abilities.Name: Move Those Feet
Abilities.Effect: After all creatures roll initiative for an encounter, but before the first turn, you can have one creature re-roll their initiative check.

AbilityDeck.Name: Berserker's Resilience
AbilityDeck.Description: The more damage you take, the stronger you become.

Abilities.Name: Berserker's Resilience
Abilities.Effect: Whenever you take damage, roll your Con die. If the result is 4 or higher, gain +1 to your next attack roll this encounter. This effect can stack if you take multiple instance of damage before attacking.

AbilityDeck.Name: Overhead Slam
AbilityDeck.Description: A heavy downward attack that knocks enemies prone.

Abilities.Name: Overhead Slam
Abilities.Effect: Make an attack against a creature within 1 space. If the attack hits, the target is knocked prone (reducing their next movement roll by half).

AbilityDeck.Name: War Cry
AbilityDeck.Description: A battle cry that demoralizes enemies and bolsters allies.

Abilities.Name: War Cry
Abilities.Effect: Roll your Cha die, Each enemy within 3 spaces subtract the result from their next attack roll.

AbilityDeck.Name: Last Stand
AbilityDeck.Description: Push yourself beyond your limits when facing death.

Abilities.Name: Last Stand
Abilities.Effect: When you reach 3 hearts or lower, roll your Con die. If the result is 4 or higher, gain +2 to all defense rolls until the end of the encounter.

AbilityDeck.Name: Defensive Stance
AbilityDeck.Description: Brace yourself against incoming attacks.

Abilities.Name: Defensive Stance
Abilities.Effect: Until the start of your next turn, whenever you roll a defense roll, you can roll twice and take the higher result.

AbilityDeck.Name: Reckless Assault
AbilityDeck.Description: Attack with full force, sacrificing defense for power.

Abilities.Name: Reckless Assault
Abilities.Effect: Make an attack with a weapon that uses your Str die. You add 2 the attack roll, but you subtract 2 from your next defense roll.

AbilityDeck.Name: Tactical Kick
AbilityDeck.Description: A swift kick to reposition your enemy.

Abilities.Name: Tactical Kick
Abilities.Effect: When a creature ends its turn within 1 space of you, you can push them 1 space directly away from you.

AbilityDeck.Name: Hold the Line
AbilityDeck.Description: Prevent enemies from slipping past you.

Abilities.Name: Hold the Line
Abilities.Effect: When an enemy moves out of a space adjacent to you, you may make an attack against them.

AbilityDeck.Name: Unbreakable Will
AbilityDeck.Description: Shake off the effects of pain and fear.

Abilities.Name: Unbreakable Will
Abilities.Effect: Whenever you are forced to roll a Int, Wis, or Cha roll to resist an enemy action you can roll your Con die instes.

AbilityDeck.Name: Shoulder Bash
AbilityDeck.Description: Ram into an opponent to unbalance them.

Abilities.Name: Shoulder Bash
Abilities.Effect: Make an attack using your Str die. If the attack hits, the target loses 1 Action Point on their next turn.

AbilityDeck.Name: Vengeance Strike
AbilityDeck.Description: Strike back with fury when an ally falls.

Abilities.Name: Vengeance Strike
Abilities.Effect: When an ally within 3 spaces loses one or more hearts, you may immediately make an attack against any enemy within range.

AbilityDeck.Name: Brutal Grapple
AbilityDeck.Description: Hold an enemy in place to control the battlefield.

Abilities.Name: Brutal Grapple
Abilities.Effect: Make an attack using your Str die. If the attack hits, the target cannot move until the start of your next turn.

AbilityDeck.Name: Furious Charge
AbilityDeck.Description: Rush forward to close the gap between you and your enemy.

Abilities.Name: Furious Charge
Abilities.Effect: Move up to 3 spaces in a straight line. If you end your movement adjacent to an enemy, make an attack with a weapon that uses your Str die.

AbilityDeck.Name: Quick Recovery
AbilityDeck.Description: Your determination allows you to resist exhaustion.

Abilities.Name: Quick Recovery
Abilities.Effect: When you roll a 1 on an attack roll, you may refresh one exhausted Action.

AbilityDeck.Name: Lunging Attack
AbilityDeck.Description: Lunge forward at an enemy.

Abilities.Name: Lunging Attack
Abilities.Effect: Make an attack with a melee weapon you have equipped. The attacks range is increased to 3 spaces.

AbilityDeck.Name: Savage Momentum
AbilityDeck.Description: Your attacks become stronger as you press the assault.

Abilities.Name: Savage Momentum
Abilities.Effect: Whenever you successfully hit a creature, your attack rolls for this encounter gains +1. This effect stacks up to +3.

AbilityDeck.Name: Crushing Blow
AbilityDeck.Description: Deliver a strike so powerful it weakens your foe's defenses.

Abilities.Name: Crushing Blow
Abilities.Effect: Make an attack using your Str die. If the attack hits, the target rolls its next defense roll with disadvantage.

AbilityDeck.Name: Battlefield Awareness
AbilityDeck.Description: Your experience in battle helps you react faster.

Abilities.Name: Battlefield Awareness
Abilities.Effect: At the start of each encounter, roll your Wis die. You may increase your initiative roll by the result.

AbilityDeck.Name: Counterstrike
AbilityDeck.Description: When an enemy fails to land a hit, you retaliate instantly.

Abilities.Name: Counterstrike
Abilities.Effect: When a creature attacks you and misses, you may immediately make an attack against that creature.

AbilityDeck.Name: Bull Rush
AbilityDeck.Description: Charge through enemies, knocking them aside.

Abilities.Name: Bull Rush
Abilities.Effect: Roll your Str die and Move up to 4 spaces in a straight line. Any enemy in your path must roll their Con die. If their result is lower than yours, they are knocked prone.

AbilityDeck.Name: Adrenaline Surge
AbilityDeck.Description: Tap into reserves of energy, pushing past exhaustion.

Abilities.Name: Adrenaline Surge
Abilities.Effect: Roll your Con die. You may refresh a number of abilites equal to half the result (rounded down).

AbilityDeck.Name: Adept Training
AbilityDeck.Description: You are skilled enough that even the worst attack is still impressive.

Abilities.Name: Adept Training
Abilities.Effect: Attack rolls you make can not be less than 4.

AbilityDeck.Name: Unyielding Guard
AbilityDeck.Description: Your stance makes you immovable.

Abilities.Name: Unyielding Guard
Abilities.Effect: If an effect would push, pull, or knock you prone, roll your Con die. If the result is 6 or higher, you resist the effect and gain +1 to your next Defense roll.

AbilityDeck.Name: Sweeping Strike
AbilityDeck.Description: Cleave through multiple enemies in a single motion.

Abilities.Name: Sweeping Strike
Abilities.Effect: Make an attack using a melee weapon. The attack affects all creatures within 1 space of you.

AbilityDeck.Name: Rallying Presence
AbilityDeck.Description: Your presence alone bolsters your allies' resolve.

Abilities.Name: Rallying Presence
Abilities.Effect: At the start of your turn, each ally within 3 spaces adds +1 to their next attack or defense roll.

AbilityDeck.Name: Brutal Reprisal
AbilityDeck.Description: Punish those who dare to attack you.

Abilities.Name: Brutal Reprisal
Abilities.Effect: When you take damage from an adjacent enemy, you may make an attack against them using your Str die. If your attack roll is 8 or higher, they also lose 1 Action Point.

AbilityDeck.Name: Shattering Strike
AbilityDeck.Description: Strike with enough force to break armor and shields.

Abilities.Name: Shattering Strike
Abilities.Effect: Make an attack using your Str die. If the attack roll is 10 or higher, the target's defense rolls are reduced by 2 until the start of your next turn.

AbilityDeck.Name: Guardian’s Reflex
AbilityDeck.Description: Protect allies in the heat of battle.

Abilities.Name: Guardian’s Reflex
Abilities.Effect: When an ally within 1 space takes damage, you may swap places with them and take the damage instead. Roll your Con die and reduce the damage by the result.

AbilityDeck.Name: Resilient Spirit
AbilityDeck.Description: Refuse to fall, even when struck down.

Abilities.Name: Resilient Spirit
Abilities.Effect: When you are reduced to 0 hearts, roll your Con die. If the result is 6 or higher, you remain standing with 1 heart and gain +1 to your next attack roll.

AbilityDeck.Name: Titan's Wrath
AbilityDeck.Description: Channel your fury into an earth-shattering strike.

Abilities.Name: Titan's Wrath
Abilities.Effect: Make an attack with a melee weapon with advantage If the result is 10 or higher, all enemies within 2 spaces take half the damage dealt. If the result is 15 or higher, they are also knocked prone.

AbilityDeck.Name: Unstoppable Force
AbilityDeck.Description: Your sheer might allows you to charge through any obstacle.

Abilities.Name: Unstoppable Force
Abilities.Effect: Roll your Str die. You may move that many spaces. You may move through enemy spaces. Any creature you move through must roll their Con die. If the result is lower than your Str die roll, they are knocked prone and take 1d4 damage.

AbilityDeck.Name: Indomitable
AbilityDeck.Description: Your willpower refuses to let you fall.

Abilities.Name: Indomitable
Abilities.Effect: When an attack would reduce you to 0 hearts, you can instead cause the attack to miss.

AbilityDeck.Name: Crippling Onslaught
AbilityDeck.Description: Your relentless strikes leave enemies weakened and exposed.

Abilities.Name: Crippling Onslaught
Abilities.Effect: Make two attacks with a melee weapon against one target. If both attacks hit, the target’s movement is reduced by half and they take -2 to their attack rolls until the start of your next turn.

AbilityDeck.Name: Vanguard’s Protection
AbilityDeck.Description: Your sheer presence makes your allies harder to harm.

Abilities.Name: Vanguard’s Protection
Abilities.Effect: You and all allies within 2 spaces gains advantage on their defense rolls.

AbilityDeck.Name: Reckless Rage
AbilityDeck.Description: Your attacks become deadlier, but at great risk to yourself.

Abilities.Name: Reckless Rage
Abilities.Effect: For the next 3 attacks you make, you roll the attack dice twice and add them together. However, all defense rolls you make are reduced by 2 sizes until you make all three attacks.

AbilityDeck.Name: Warlord’s Command
AbilityDeck.Description: Your voice alone can turn the tide of battle.

Abilities.Name: Warlord’s Command
Abilities.Effect: Choose up to 3 allies within 5 spaces. They immediately move up to 2 spaces and can make an attack with a +1 bonus to their roll.

AbilityDeck.Name: Eye of the Storm
AbilityDeck.Description: At the center of battle, your precision is unmatched.

Abilities.Name: Eye of the Storm
Abilities.Effect: For the next 3 turns, when rolling an attack roll, if the result is 5 or lower, you may re-roll once.

AbilityDeck.Name: Raging Resurgence
AbilityDeck.Description: Your fury fuels you, healing wounds as you fight.

Abilities.Name: Raging Resurgence
Abilities.Effect: At the start of your turn, roll your Con die. You regain hearts equal to half the result, rounded up.

AbilityDeck.Name: Decisive Execution
AbilityDeck.Description: Strike with lethal efficiency, ensuring your enemy falls.

Abilities.Name: Decisive Execution
Abilities.Effect: Make an attack using your Str die. If the target is at half their maximum hearts or lower, they take double damage from the attack.

Name: Scout
Description: A master of stealth, deception, and agility. You strike from the shadows and take what you need before anyone notices.

ClassAbilities.Name: Detect Weakpoints
ClassAbilities.Effect: Choose a creature within 5 spaces and roll your Wis die. The next defense roll the target makes is reduced by the result.

ClassAbilities.Name: Evasion
ClassAbilities.Effect: Gain +2 to defense rolls against attacks originating from more that 1 space away.

Name: Chaplain
Description: A devoted servant of the divine, wielding holy magic to heal and protect allies while smiting foes.

ClassAbilities.Name: Healing Touch
ClassAbilities.Effect: Restore a number of to an ally within reach equal to a roll of your Wis die.

ClassAbilities.Name: Divine Protection
ClassAbilities.Effect: Undead that attack you must roll their attack twice and take the lower result.

Name: Mystic
Description: A scholar of the arcane, capable of wielding powerful spells but physically frail.

ClassAbilities.Name: Fireball
ClassAbilities.Effect: Choose a space within 5 spaces of you. Each creature in that space, or adjacent to it, loses 1d4 hearts (roll seperatly for each effected creature).

ClassAbilities.Name: Arcane Defence
ClassAbilities.Effect: Your defense rolls use your Int instead of your Dex.
